sn6.14:2.2: aruṇavatiyaṃ kho pana bhikkhave rājadhāniyaṃ (pts-vp-pli1ed, mr)
sn6.14:3.4: khiyyanti → khīyanti (bj, sya-all, km, pts-vp-pli1ed, pts-vp-pli2ed)
sn6.14:5.3: sahassilokadhātuṃ → sahassīlokadhātuṃ (bj, sya-all, km, pts-vp-pli1ed, pts-vp-pli2ed)
sn6.14:6.1: Ārambhatha → ārabhatha (bj); ārabbhatha (sya-all, pts-vp-pli1ed, pts-vp-pli2ed) | nikkamatha → nikkhamatha (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed, pts-vp-pli2ed)
